summary:
Self-motivated and driven professional with a proven track record in leading internal and external delivery teams, providing functional, technical and strategic leadership for the eCommerce delivery organization within the Digital Technology Services function.
Responsible for the delivery, management and support of eCommerce websites and systems supporting over $ 800MM revenue, that includes ecommerce sites under DTS management.  The annual project portfolio is ~$10MM per year.
Aligning IT strategy to support and leverage technology and the investment in technology across the company
Defining strategic investment roadmaps in technology that have cost and benefit implications over time. 
Proven delivery leader with a strong record of success in delivering global, highly available solutions.
Designs practical, expansive architectures meeting current and future business needs and strategy with optimized cost of ownership

Specialties: Delivery Leadership • Budget Management • Digital Transformation • Enterprise Architecture • Solution Design • Business Architecture • 
 Digital Solutions • eCommerce Applications • Integration • Business Process Design • IT Strategy • IT Management • Security

currentPositions.description:
Maintain and support current and evolving enterprise platforms, supporting eCommerce systems.  Provide technical leadership for the Digital, Commerce and integration platforms in use globally.
Support the management of the department budget ~$60MM and the assigned delivery program budgets ~$10MM
Maintain expenses in support of the platform's opportunities, demand and requirements.
Establish, foster and strengthen customer and supplier relationships.  Partner with Business Relationship Management and Divisional Business leaders to continuously improve customer satisfaction and the level of service provided.
Build quality, customer service and delivery focussed organization with continuous improvement and continuous  delivery culture
Lead delivery for the eCommerce systems for the underpinning a billion dollar business.
Lead delivery for the build of an enterprise scale integration platform as the foundation for the integration strategy and delivery owner for the services factory supporting all digital and ecommerce programs.  Lead the delivery of the ecommerce foundation integration design and build.
Manage performance, coach team members, and deliver on objectives while driving a culture of excellence
Drive design, delivery, quality and support improvements through all teams involved in the development to production support cycle to improve efficiency and reduce total cost of ownership while improving ability to manage more change.
currentPositions.title: Delivery Director, eCommerce

projects.description:
Design and Implementation of a geo-distributed employee portal to support 300 000 employees across 3 regions. 
Infrastructure Architecture to support more than 120K unique visitors per day, providing search, publishing and social capabilities.
Migration of multiple legacy intranet solutions to the SharePoint 2010 based one using structured content migration approach and tools
projects.title: Large SharePoint Employee Portal

projects.description: Upgrade of a geo-distributed, 100% available SAP NetWeaver portal used as the single global access point for all end users to all business processes used. Upgrade to an existing systems landscape with no end user visible outages to this business critical system.
projects.title: Upgrade Business Critical SAP NetWeaver Portal

projects.description:
Detailed RFP with different vendors (Cisco, F5, Citrix) in order to identify the next generation application delivery controller (ADC) and provide the best-in-class load balancing platform to the heterogeneous landscape of GLOBE Nestlé IT services (over 50 mission-critical global applications).

Comprehensive analysis of functional requirements together with several Nestlé application teams in order to improve networking capabilities, application performances, authentication and security / compliance approaches.

From the initial design phase to the complete deployment, this project proved the ability of different application and the networking teams to work in synergy for providing an enhanced and comprehensive IT infrastructure, which ultimately delivered a better solution for the Nestlé Business.
projects.title: Load Balancer infrastructure redesign project

projects.description:
Design, lead architecture and implementation of target state business critical loyalty platform and web tier as a first transition to achieving long term IT strategy.  This was the implementation of the foundation layer that will support the business strategy for the medium term and accelerate innovation opportunities.

Leading the design, system integration, data migration and cut-over activities to successful execution within project timelines and budget.  

Project included the seamless migration of 3.5 million loyalty program members from the legacy platform.
projects.title: Loyalty System migration for German market

projects.description:
Design, build and deliver a comprehensive business transformation program for a major loyalty program covering digital, integration, security and loyalty systems and operations involving over 5 million members, 140 business partners and 35 interconnected on premise and cloud hosted systems.

Lead end to end design activities including business and technical requirements gathering, technology and infrastructure design, solution design and implementation, system & business partner integration, business process definition and business rule definition.

Drive delivery of all technical delivery sub-teams with the PMO including: digital, integration and loyalty development teams; environments and phased delivery to manage program program and timeline risks; testing;  security; and data migration

Design, deliver and execute the cut-over plan with the cut-over manager including: managing dependencies and sequences; defining a low risk approach to complex cut-over process; dealing with all technical issues during execution while maintaining the overall plan integrity by understanding the dependencies within the processes and systems landscape; and finally, transitioning the cut-over to hyper-care and then to business as usual operations.
projects.title: Digital, Loyalty Business and Technology Transformation Program

projects.description: Implementation of new processes and technologies to transform the retail experience on board for guests and cabin crew.  Transform the procurement, logistics, warehousing and packing processes for duty free, buy on board and ancillary products.  Implement the foundational platforms to enable the business strategies for inflight to be realized.
projects.title: Inflight Retail Transformation

educations.schoolName: South African Institute of Chartered Accountants
University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika
University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika

headline: Delivery Director, eCommerce

commentary.text: Congrats Petra. It is fantastic working with you!!!

Give your team the chance to innovate dynamically and they will surprise you with the creativity and the problems they choose to solve. This hackathon showed great engagement and the powerful initiative of our India based team. Thank you all for your commitment, going above and beyond. Thank you to the winners for providing actionable solutions we can productionize. I look forward to the next rounds. #investinginourteam #innovationatwork. Thanks to Sanjay Nair and his leaders to make this happen!

We push each other daily to deliver on time and above expectations with our business partners so we decided to change the scenery for a day. It was great for us to spend some time walking with part of our Ireland team thinking of nature, chatting and learning more about each other. Thank you Laura Mahon for the organization and thank you Laura Mahon and Muhamad Shahzad Amin for the great leaders you are and all you do for your teams. #HighPerformingTeamatPlay #GreatPlacetoWork
